adDetails: Having a hard time organizing? Spring cleaning can be a tough task to take on, especially if you feel to overwhelmed to start! I can help you organize your home, office, clothing, to do tasks, kitchen, photos, files, etc. so you can regain order in your home/business and you'll love how being organized can make you more productive and positive! DUE TO EXTREME AMOUNTS OF SPAM FROM THIS POST PLEASE PUT 'Personal Organizer-(your city)' IN THE EMAIL SUBJECT LINE. THANK YOU! Thank you & I look forward to making your life easier! Rate:$25/hr *** NOT A HOUSEKEEPER OR CLEANER-I AM A PERSONAL ORGANIZER/ASSISTANT***
